channel.title: API DEVELOPMENT on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Brown API
item.author: john_roy1@brown.edu (Johnny Roy)
item.description: The Problem Brown University previously had a student-maintained API to give quick access to real-time laundry and dining data. However, the developers graduated and the repository sunk into deprecation as the websites they sourced their data from changed. The Goal To reboot the Brown API, fixing it and making it more efficient, modular, and readable The Execution I began with a fork of the original Brown API repository and found that there were several problems.
